name: storra
author: Bastian Krol
description: a generic stand-alone data store with a RESTful interface which can be configured to use different storage engines (MongoDB, nStore, node-dirty, ...), all encapsulated behind the same REST API

comment_devDependencies.comment: Some stuff should be installed globally by doing npm install -g <package>@<version>. There is no way to do that via package.json. So it is just mentioned here as a reminder.
comment_devDependencies.supervisor: Using supervisor during development is also highly recommended.
